question:
Which of the following come within the ambit of Article 21 of the Indian Constitution?
(a) Right to shelter
(b) Right to good roads
(c) Right to reputation
(d) Right to pure drinking water
Select the correct answer from the code given below:
explanation: Article 21 of the Constitution of India held that no person shall be deprived of his life or personal liberty except according to procedure established by law and all mentioned above rights are the part of Article as declared by Supreme Court.
